{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Knife making {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Knife making Knife making is the process of manufacturing a knife by any one or a combination of processes: stock removal, forging to shape, welded lamination or investment cast. Typical metals used come from the carbon steel, tool, or stainless steel families. Primitive knives have been made from bronze, copper, brass, iron, obsidian, and flint. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knife making)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
